articles.title: As AI and Crypto Mining Converge, Energy Pressures Spark Global Shift In Hashrate and Regulation
articles.summary: The rapid convergence of artificial intelligence and cryptocurrency mining is intensifying global energy pressures, forcing miners to adapt through renewables, AI optimization, and shifting regional strategies.

articles.summary: "Artificial intelligence is going to replace literally half of all white-collar workers in the U.S.," one CEO says. But not these.

articles.title: How is artificial intelligence affecting job searches?
articles.summary: AI has already become a disruptor in the labor market, as job postings declined over the past year by 6.7%, with entry-level positions especially hard-hit. But not all industries are affected by the push for AI.

articles.title: How ‘Clanker’ Became an Anti-A.I. Rallying Cry
articles.summary: The term, which was popularized by a “Star Wars” show and is rooted in real frustrations with technology, has become a go-to slur against artificial intelligence and robots.
articles.translated_title: How ‘Clanker’ Became an Anti-A.I. Rallying Cry

articles.title: ¿Es la inteligencia artificial la nueva religión de Silicon Valley?
articles.summary: Aunque los chatbots como ChatGPT penetraron en el espíritu de nuestros tiempos hace muy poco, ciertos círculos de Silicon Valley han profetizado sobre el poder de la IA durante décadas.
articles.translated_title: ¿Es la inteligencia artificial la nueva religión de Silicon Valley?
articles.translated_summary: Aunque los chatbots como ChatGPT penetraron en el espíritu de nuestros tiempos hace muy poco, ciertos círculos de Silicon Valley han profetizado sobre el poder de la IA durante décadas.

articles.title: Global movement to protect kids online fuels a wave of AI safety tech
articles.summary: The global online safety movement has paved the way for a number of artificial intelligence-powered products designed to keep kids away from potentially harmful things on the internet
